67 /** channel states */
68 SPS_CHANNEL_STATE_s sps_channelStatus[SPS_NR_OF_AVAILABLE_SPS_CHANNELS] = {
69  {SPS_CHANNEL_OFF, SPS_CHANNEL_OFF, 0.0f, SPS_AFF_CONTACTOR, SPS_CHANNEL_ON_DEFAULT_THRESHOLD_mA},
70  {SPS_CHANNEL_OFF, SPS_CHANNEL_OFF, 0.0f, SPS_AFF_CONTACTOR, SPS_CHANNEL_ON_DEFAULT_THRESHOLD_mA},
71  {SPS_CHANNEL_OFF, SPS_CHANNEL_OFF, 0.0f, SPS_AFF_CONTACTOR, SPS_CHANNEL_ON_DEFAULT_THRESHOLD_mA},
72  {SPS_CHANNEL_OFF, SPS_CHANNEL_OFF, 0.0f, SPS_AFF_CONTACTOR, SPS_CHANNEL_ON_DEFAULT_THRESHOLD_mA},
73  {SPS_CHANNEL_OFF, SPS_CHANNEL_OFF, 0.0f, SPS_AFF_CONTACTOR, SPS_CHANNEL_ON_DEFAULT_THRESHOLD_mA},
74  {SPS_CHANNEL_OFF, SPS_CHANNEL_OFF, 0.0f, SPS_AFF_CONTACTOR, SPS_CHANNEL_ON_DEFAULT_THRESHOLD_mA},
75  {SPS_CHANNEL_OFF, SPS_CHANNEL_OFF, 0.0f, SPS_AFF_CONTACTOR, SPS_CHANNEL_ON_DEFAULT_THRESHOLD_mA},
76  {SPS_CHANNEL_OFF, SPS_CHANNEL_OFF, 0.0f, SPS_AFF_GENERAL_IO, SPS_CHANNEL_ON_DEFAULT_THRESHOLD_mA},
77 };
78 
79 /** mapping of channel states to feedback pins
80  *
81  * * IDs are the same as in #sps_channelStatus (#SPS_CHANNEL_INDEX)
82  * * The mapping is intended to be constant; if a feedback channel shall be
83  * used, this should also be configured in #sps_channelStatus
84 */
85 const SPS_CHANNEL_FEEDBACK_MAPPING_s sps_kChannelFeedbackMapping[SPS_NR_OF_AVAILABLE_SPS_CHANNELS] = {
86  {PEX_PORT_EXPANDER1, PEX_PIN00},
87  {PEX_PORT_EXPANDER1, PEX_PIN01},
88  {PEX_PORT_EXPANDER1, PEX_PIN02},
89  {PEX_PORT_EXPANDER1, PEX_PIN03},
90  {PEX_PORT_EXPANDER1, PEX_PIN04},
91  {PEX_PORT_EXPANDER1, PEX_PIN05},
92  {PEX_PORT_EXPANDER1, PEX_PIN06},
93  {PEX_PORT_EXPANDER1, PEX_PIN07},
94 };
